summary: GitHub Actions dropped support for Node16-based actions and now enforces Node20, breaking CI builds that relied on GLIBC 2.24 Docker images for compatibility with older Linux distributions.
userImpact: CI builds are failing and official SDK releases cannot run on older Linux distributions that customers still use.
rootCause: GitHub Actions Runner agent now enforces Node20 execution regardless of actions requesting Node16, and Node20 requires GLIBC 2.27 which is incompatible with older Linux distros.
keyQuote: GitHub Action's just started enforcing the long-announced EOL on Node16-based actions. Basically, the latest release of GHA's Runner agent ignores the fact that an action is requesting node16, and instead just calls node20 anyway.
